title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Justice and Equality (Alteration of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Justice and Equality (Alteration of 

Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited justice equality (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 1 november 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais and, in the 
English language, the Department of Justice and Equality, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt and, in the English language, to that 
of the Department of Justice.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn dli agus cirt agus comhionannais english language department justice equality altered irish language roinn dli agus cirt english language department justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais 
and, in the English language, the Minister for Justice and Equality, is altered, in 
the Irish language, to that of an tAire Dlí agus Cirt and, in the English language, 
to that of the Minister for Justice.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire dli agus cirt agus comhionannais english language minister justice equality altered irish language taire dli agus cirt english language minister justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Justice and Equality shall be 
construed as references to the Department of Justice; 

references to the Minister for Justice and Equality shall be 
construed as references to the Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [452] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
